name: Ghost CMI
author: Razboy20@razboy.dev
description: Runs a Ghost CMI Web Server through pterodactyl.

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash

cd /mnt/server

apk --no-cache add curl git

git clone https://github.com/razboy20/pterodactyl-ghost ./temp

cp -r ./temp/caddy /mnt/server/
cp -r ./temp/php-fpm /mnt/server/
cp ./temp/start.sh /mnt/server
curl "https://caddyserver.com/api/download?os=linux&arch=amd64&idempotency=33572405766393" -s --output /mnt/server/caddy-server

chmod +x /mnt/server/caddy-server
chmod +x /mnt/server/start.sh

rm -rf ./temp

ghost install --dir /mnt/server/ghost --db mysql --no-start --no-enable --no-prompt --no-setup

ghost config --ip 0.0.0.0 --port 2368 --no-prompt --db mysql --dbhost DBHOSTHERE --dbuser DBUSERHERE --dbpass PASSCODEHERE --url http://localhost:2368 --process local
ghost setup linux-user --no-prompt
